Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli K-12 D31;Gram-positive bacterium:Bacillus subtilis strain 60015.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: It is characterized by a structure of amphipathic α-helices and an invariant framework of cysteine residues involved in disulfide bonds.
Sequence Information.Function: Posesses antibacterial, cytotoxicity and pore-forming activity. In concentrations up to 10 µm, naegleriapore A is inactive against the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli D31. The specific pore-forming activities of naegleriapore A and B are 3.1±1.7 units pmol−1 and 3.7±1.3 units pmol−1, respectively.

Literature.Title: Pore-forming polypeptides of the pathogenic protozoon Naegleria fowleri.
Literature.Author: Herbst R, Ott C, Jacobs T, Marti T, Marciano-Cabral F, Leippe M.
